title: LOST MY IP AND DIDN'T UNLOCK MY CHAMPION !!
body:
hello yesterday i get my 4800 ip and wanted to buy a new champion i went for talon and click unlock and as usual i went to check him in my owned champions list and i didnt find him just my old champions , wnt for a match and this is also happens restart the client i found out my ip goes down to 25 ip and still talon unlocked

plz help , thx

best regards

replies.body: I went ahead and looked into your inventory and purchase history, and it does look like there was some kind of hiccup when you bought Talon. We can get this taken care of for you, but you'll need to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
